speech.p: I remind the House that I expect to be in the Chair today until 1.30 pm. I encourage all Members who have not already taken the Oath to come to the Chamber this morning to do so.
Will Members wishing to take their seats please come to the Table?
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Right honourable Nicklaus Thomas-Symonds, for Torfaen
Right honourable John Healey, Rawmarsh and Conisbrough
Stephen Nathan Kinnock, Aberafan Maesteg
Right honourable John Martin McDonnell, Hayes and Harlington
Right honourable Graham Charles Stuart, Beverley and Holderness
Pamela Margaret Cox, Colchester
Anthony Vaughan, Folkestone and Hythe
Clive Anthony Lewis, Norwich South
Uma Kumaran, Stratford and Bow
Stephen James Witherden, Montgomeryshire and Glyndŵr
Adnan Hussain, Blackburn
Mohammad Saqib Bhatti, Meriden and Solihull East
Dame Margaret Olivia Hillier, Hackney South and Shoreditch
Imran Hussain, Bradford East
Daniel Stephen Zeichner, Cambridge
Resolved, That this House do now adjourn until tomorrow at twenty-five minutes past Eleven o’clock. —(Gen Kitchen.)
House adjourned.
